body_html:
I get this error instead @zou3519 when using gcc 4.9.0, doesn't make it very far at all.

running install
running build_deps
cmake: /scinet/gpc/compilers/gcc-4.9.0/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by cmake)
cmake: /scinet/gpc/compilers/gcc-4.9.0/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.9' not found (required by cmake)

body:
I get this error instead @zou3519 when using gcc 4.9.0, doesn't make it very far at all.
```
running install
running build_deps
cmake: /scinet/gpc/compilers/gcc-4.9.0/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by cmake)
cmake: /scinet/gpc/compilers/gcc-4.9.0/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.9' not found (required by cmake)
```
